You are experiencing the following symptoms:
- Sudden onset of swelling in your right arm, which has been gradually increasing over the past two days

- Noticeable prominence of superficial veins on your arm and shoulder
These symptoms came into fruition suddenly yesterday after a long period of inactivity during a recent long flight and a recent cancer diagnosis.
